entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
